name: Alchemy Knight
description:
Forget about the difficult and complex RPG Games!
Feel the hit from fancy skill effects with simple control!
Collect various equipment by clearing the Stages of various difficulties!
Prepare for the challenging battles by merging equipment and enhancing skills!

[Attractions]
■ Auto-aim, Auto-battle Skill Action RPG Game!
■ High-quality 3D Characters and Monsters!
■ Try out Various but Unique Stages!
■ Strategize the Skill Set for Your Own Play Style!
■ Utilize Various Skills to Take down the Monsters!
■ Strengthen the Character by Merging the Collected Equipment!
■ Collect Unique Items by Defeating Stage Bosses!
